name: Number.isFinite
description: The Number.isFinite() method determines whether the passed value is a finite number — that is, it checks that the type of a given value is Number, and the number is neither positive Infinity, negative Infinity, nor NaN.

refs.name: ECMAScript (ECMA-262)
refs.description: The definition of 'Number.isInteger' in the 'ECMAScript (ECMA-262)' specification.
